Class.name: Demo.HL7.MsgRouter.Functions
Class.Description: Functions to use in rule definitions for the sample message router production.

Method.name: DayOfWeek
Method.Description: Returns the ordinal position of the day in the week, where 1 is Sunday, 2 is Monday, and so on.

Method.name: TimeInSeconds
Method.Description: Returns the time as a number of seconds since midnight.
